discourse_list.title: How/where do I source the numbers for a MakerDAO income statement?

content.content: I’m in the process of creating a granular income statement (with all relevant segmentation) for the MakerDAO system although I’m uncertain as to where and how to find these numbers, whether it is a centralized or decentralized method I’d like to know both, any references or explanations will be appreciated.
Hello hello! You may want to look at this report. If you need more information, perhaps that thread would be a good place to ask follow up questions?

I can also recommend this tool so you have another perspective.    dune.xyz    Dune Analytics Ethereum Ecosystem analytics by and for the community. Explore and share data from Ethereum Mainnet, Matic, Optimism and xDai for free.
